CsGL.Pointers
Class PVoid

   in PVoid.cs
Direct Known Subclasses:
PDouble, PFloat, PInt16, PInt32, PInt64, PInt8, PUInt16, PUInt32, PUInt64, PUInt8
class PVoid
extends IDisposable, Pointer

PVoid provides a basic class for the void* type, it inherits from Pointer (see the Pointer header file) and IDisposable interface for correctly disposing the pointer, PVoid is abstract class and is not used 'directly'.

Field Summary
protected void* data
          void* data: The unsafe pointer to the data contained within the class.
 int Length
          Length accessor, procedural.
protected int length
          length: the length of the data in units returned from SizeOfType.

          Constructor/Initializer for n values, owner is set to true.
~PVoid()
          A simple passthrough call to the Dispose function.
 
Method Summary
protected void check( int index )
          Throws an ObjectDisposedException("Pointer already freed") if the PVoid is set to the null or an IndexOutOfRangeException() if this index would be out of range.
protected void Copy( void* dst, int dstlen, int p0, void* src, int srclen, int p1, int len )
          Copies from src to dst, copies len SizeOfType atomic elements, starting at p0 in dst and at p1 in src, throws ObjectDisposedException if either is NULL, throws IndexOutOfRangeException if either would write beyond the end of their allocation.
 void Dispose()
          Properly disposes of the memory through calls to the FreeFct delegate, if the memory cannot be successfully deallocated the pointer is set to NULL and the length is reduced to 0.
 static implicit operator IntPtr( PVoid p )
          Casts the class to an IntPtr, see the Pointer header source.
 abstract int SizeOfType()
          Abstract method which gives the atomic size of the type being allocated.
 static explicit operator void*( PVoid p )
          Casts the class to a void*, see the Pointer header source.

Method Detail

check

protected void check( int index );
Throws an ObjectDisposedException("Pointer already freed") if the PVoid is set to the null or an IndexOutOfRangeException() if this index would be out of range.
Parameters:
index - The index to check against the memory array.

Copy

protected void Copy( void* dst, int dstlen, int p0, void* src, int srclen, int p1, int len );
Copies from src to dst, copies len SizeOfType atomic elements, starting at p0 in dst and at p1 in src, throws ObjectDisposedException if either is NULL, throws IndexOutOfRangeException if either would write beyond the end of their allocation.
Parameters:
dst - The memory to be copied into.
dstlen - The length of dst.
p0 - The place to begin copying to.
src - The memory to be copied from.
srclen - The length of src.
p1 - The place to begin copying from.
len - The number of atomic elements (see SizeOfType) to be copied.

Dispose

public void Dispose();
Properly disposes of the memory through calls to the FreeFct delegate, if the memory cannot be successfully deallocated the pointer is set to NULL and the length is reduced to 0.

IntPtr

public static implicit operator IntPtr( PVoid p );
Casts the class to an IntPtr, see the Pointer header source.

SizeOfType

public abstract int SizeOfType();
Abstract method which gives the atomic size of the type being allocated.

void*

public static explicit operator void*( PVoid p );
Casts the class to a void*, see the Pointer header source.
